com.qti.snapdragon.sdk.display

Class PictureAdjustmentConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qti.snapdragon.sdk.display.PictureAdjustmentConfig

  • public class PictureAdjustmentConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a storage for Picture Adjustment Config Attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PictureAdjustmentConfig

        public PictureAdjustmentConfig(java.util.EnumSet<PictureAdjustmentConfig.PICTURE_ADJUSTMENT_PARAMS> paramFlags,
                       int hue,
                       int saturation,
                       int intensity,
                       int contrast,
                       int sat_thresh)
        This constructor will create the instance with the required parameters
        Parameters:
        paFlags - EnumSet of PICTURE_ADJUSTMENT_PARAMS indicating which of the parameters need to be set
        hue - hue value.
        saturation - saturation value
        intensity - the intensity value
        contrast - contrast value
        sat_thresh - global saturation threshold below which no adjustment happens
